name: GEMEG
description: During 2019 I founded and acted as director of development of the study group on  plant breeding at the Federal Univeristy of Viçosa where i developed a series of  projects in the academic enviroment seeking to bring students closer to the theme and to get closer to the scientific environment. I currently actas co-director assisting my sucessors.

name: LAPEA
description: In the laboratory of analysis and research in applied statistics i work developing solution for scientific projects in a statistical environment. With a trained team and a above average advisor, i'm the youngest but still having several opportunities to complement my knowledge.

name: RIDESA
description: The Program for Genetic Improvement of Sugarcane, PMGCA, of the Department of Phytotechnics of the Federal University of Viçosa, UFV, has as main objective to develop sugarcane cultivars through technical cooperation with sugar producing plants and distilleries, ethanol and energy in Minas Gerais. There i'm acting with PIBIC projects about analysis of the near infrared variability in sugar cane phenotyping and with discrimination of sugar cane families through the analysis of RGB images

name: Federal University of Viçosa
description: This is where you put description about your projects.
